english.segment1: The world will fade away. As I lift my hands. A king that's worthy of praise. Is the Great I Am
english.segment2: The joy you've given rings out. As I lift my voice
english.segment3: I'm captivated by your ways so I will worship You
english.segment4: You've taken me by love. You've taken me by grace. You've taken me away. I can't resist because. You've taken heart
english.segment5: All creation will bow. to the risen king. All of heaven will shout. And the earth sing
english.segment6: The joy you've given rings out. As I lift my voice
english.segment7: I'm captivated by your ways so I will worship You
